name: Planet of the Tigers
description:
Submission for a game jam called TigerJ(am) #3 hosted by 8 bits to Infinity, Retro Indie Josh, & TigerJ.

In Planet of the Tigers the roles are reversed and you are a lone Antelope on a mission to destroy all tigers. Since the theme was sdrawkcab si gnihtyrevE (Everything is backwards), I thought I should start the game like you were playing from the final level to the beginning level. 

First level starts off with a boss as you progress the game get's easier!
